      "application/vnd.jupyter.widget-view+json": {
       "model_id": "62b98a3a99e4404981649dd212495e18"

     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "from ipywidgets import *\n",
    "from IPython.display import display\n",
    "w1 = IntSlider()\n",
    "display(w1)\n",
    "\n",
    "w2 = Text()\n",
    "display(w2)\n",
    "\n",
    "button = Button(description=\"Submit\")\n",
    "display(button)\n",
    "dict = {'val':w1.value,'text':w2.value}\n",
    "def on_button_clicked(b):\n",
    "#     print(dict)\n",
    "    if dict['text']=='hi':\n",
    "        w3 = Checkbox(value=False,description='Hi there!',disabled=False)\n",
    "        display(w3)\n",
    "def handle_submit(sender):\n",
    "    dict['text'] = w2.value\n",
    "def on_value_change(change):\n",
    "    #print (change)\n",
    "    dict['val'] = change['new']\n",
    "def on_text_change(change):\n",
    "    #print (change)\n",
    "    dict['text'] = change['new']\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "# w2.on_submit(handle_submit)\n",
    "w1.observe(on_value_change, names = 'value')\n",
    "w2.observe(on_text_change, names='value')\n",
    "button.on_click(on_button_clicked)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": true,

     "jupyter_dashboards": {
      "version": 1,
      "views": {
       "grid_default": {
        "hidden": true
       },
       "report_default": {}
      }
     }
    }
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "if dict['val']==77:\n",
    "    w4 = Checkbox(value=False,description='We love number 7!',disabled=True)\n",
    "    display(w4)"
   ]
  },
